author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sun Race Sturmey-Archer to issue 10 mln shares to replenish working capital
text:
March 26(Reuters) - Sun Race Sturmey-Archer Inc
* Says it plans to issue 10 million new shares, with par value of T$10 per share
* 15 percent of the new shares to be offered to the companyâ€™s employees, 10 percent of the new shares to be offered through public offering, and remaining 75 percent to be offered to the existing shareholders
* Proceeds will be used to replenish working capital
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/yLSocA
